description:
A sophisticated website hijack campaign initially detected in February has seen a dramatic escalation, with security analysts now estimating that approximately 150,000 websites have been compromised. The initial discovery flagged over 35,000 targeted websites. Himanshu Anand, a software engineer and security analyst at c/side, has continued to monitor the threat actor’s activities and uncovered new... Read more »

The post Website hijack campaign now impacting 150,000 sites appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Website hijack campaign now impacting 150,000 sites
